datalog_relationships:
has_role(S, 'pc-member') :- Subject(S).
is_subreviewer(S, R) :- Subject(S), Resource(R).
datalog_actions: deny_access(S, R) :- Subject(S), Resource(R), has_role(S, 'pc-member'), is_subreviewer(S, R).

datalog_relationships: has_role(S, 'pc-member') :- Subject(S). is_subreviewer(S, R) :- Subject(S), Resource(R).
datalog_actions: can_write(S, R) :- Subject(S), Resource(R), has_role(S, 'pc-member'), is_subreviewer(S, R).
deny_access(S, R) :- PC_Member(S), Subreviewer(S), Resource(R), is_subject_user_id_equal_to_resource_user_id(S, R).
